com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.applogic_objects

Class WiFiEnvironmentVariable

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.baseclasses.EnvironmentVariable
      • com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.applogic_objects.WiFiEnvironmentVariable

  • public class WiFiEnvironmentVariable
extends EnvironmentVariable
    Created by aravind on 10/8/14. Class representing a Wifi environment variable. Stores the SSID and encryption type pertaining to Wi-Fi networks.

        public boolean isStringValuesSupported()
        Description copied from class: EnvironmentVariable
        This method indicates whether string values are in used to store data related to this environment variable
        Specified by:

      • isFloatValuesSupported

        public boolean isFloatValuesSupported()
        Description copied from class: EnvironmentVariable
        This method indicates whether real values are in used to store data related to this environment variable. Although the function name says float, in practise double is the data tye used to store the values.
        Specified by:
        isFloatValuesSupported in class EnvironmentVariable
        Returns:
        true if real values are used, false otherwise

      • getWiFiEnvironmentVariablesFromCursor

        public static java.util.List<EnvironmentVariable> getWiFiEnvironmentVariablesFromCursor(android.database.Cursor wifiCursor)
        Converts cursor into a list of WifiEnvironmentVariables
        Parameters:
        wifiCursor - should contain values from wifi_networks table
        Returns:
        list of WifiEnvironmentVariables read from the cursor

      • getWifiEnvironmentVariableFromDatabase

        public static WiFiEnvironmentVariable getWifiEnvironmentVariableFromDatabase(android.content.Context context,
                                                             java.lang.String SSID,
                                                             java.lang.String encryptionType)
        gets a Wifi environment variable from the database
        Parameters:
        context - Activity/Service context
        SSID - ssid of the network
        encryptionType - security of the network
        Returns:
        null if a match is not found in the db, else an instance of WifiEnvironmentVariable with given ssid and security is returned.
